tool_description: Configures and manages nameserver assignments for domains across different DNS hosting providers.

domain_name.description: Domain name to configure nameservers for

nameservers.description: List of nameserver hostnames or IP addresses

dns_provider.description: DNS hosting provider (cloudflare, route53, digitalocean, custom)

error_messages: Invalid nameserver format: Nameservers must be valid hostnames or IP addresses.
Insufficient nameservers: At least 2 nameservers required, maximum 13 allowed.
Nameserver unreachable: One or more nameservers are not responding to DNS queries.
Domain locked: Domain is locked and nameserver changes are not permitted.
Provider mismatch: Nameservers don't match the specified DNS provider's format.
usage: Provide domain name and 2-13 nameserver addresses. Optionally specify DNS provider for automatic nameserver validation and configuration.

configuration_status.description: Status of nameserver configuration (success, failed, pending)
